          <title>
            <string language="en">Electric circuit breaker</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Elektrische Sicherung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Disjoncteur électrique</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Disjuntor de circuito elétrico</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Interruttore elettrico</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ηλεκτρικός διακόπτης</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Interruptor eléctrico</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">First of two illustrations showing a circuit breaker during normal current. The switch is on in this case.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">current</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">on</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">plunger</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">switch</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zuerst von zwei Abbildungen, die eine Sicherung 
während des normalen Stromes zeigen. Der Schalter ist 
eingeschaltet in diesem Fall.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">D'abord de deux illustrations montrant un 
disjoncteur pendant le courant normal. Le commutateur est 
allumé dans ce cas-ci.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Primeiramente de duas ilustrações que mostram 
um disjuntor de circuito durante a corrente normal. O 
interruptor está sobre neste caso.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">In primo luogo di due illustrazioni che mostrano 
un interruttore durante la corrente normale. L'interruttore è 
sopra in questo caso.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πρώτα δύο απεικονίσεων που εμφανίζουν έναν διακόπτη 
κατά τη διάρκεια του κανονικού ρεύματος. Ο διακόπτης είναι
σε αυτήν την περίπτωση.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Primero de dos ilustraciones que muestran un 
interruptor durante corriente normal. El interruptor está 
encendido en este caso.</string>
          </description>

          </keyword>
